newsitem.title: JAPAN: Fuji Heavy jumps on earnings report.
newsitem.headline: Fuji Heavy jumps on earnings report.

text.p: Shares in Fuji Heavy Industries Ltd jumped in early morning trade, reacting to a media report that its interim parent current profit would be about 4.5 times as large as its actual interim current profit a year ago, brokers said.
As of 0029 GMT, the shares were up 10 yen at 525 yen with a trade volume of 790,000, the fourth heaviest.

Fuji Heavy is expected to post a parent current profit of about 10 billion yen in the six months to September 30, about 4.5 times as large as its actual current profit in the year-earlier period, Japanese economic daily Nihon Keizai Shimbun said on Wednesday.
Fuji Heavy was not immediately available for comment.
